precautions: Before taking Terbutaline, consult your doctor about the Syrup. The Britanyl Syrup has some inactive ingredients which cause severe allergic reactions. Explain your medical history to your doctor before getting this medication, especially heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, and low blood level of potassium. This drug makes you dizzy if you are using cannabis with this drug. Do not drive until you do not get some safety precautions. Tell your doctor about this product usage with cannabis. By using this product, the greater risk of an effect is in your heart. You can use this medicine with the consultation of a doctor. Terbutaline passes in breast milk, which is dangerous for babies.
effects: Every medicine has some side effects. Most of them do not require any medical condition. If you fund any of these symptoms, seek medical attention. This medication has caused fatal breathing problems, asthma, sudden wheezing.This drug does not cause any allergic reaction, but if you found to consult your doctor. title: Bronchilate 120ML Syp
details: It is used to relieve the symptoms of asthma and COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). It can treat shortness of breath, coughing, chest tightness, and bronchospasm, etc.
precautions: Consult a doctor if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients/components. Keep it out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature, i.e. below 30 degrees Celsius. Protect from heat, light, humidity, and direct exposure to sunlight.
effects: It rarely cause any kinds of side effects or adverse reactions. Although, you may consult your doctor, pharmacist, or physician if it causes digestive problems to you. Side effects may include gas, bloating, GERD, flatulence, vomiting, nausea, diarrhea, constipation, abdominal cramps, swelling or inflammation, skin irritations, itching, headaches, etc. Consult your doctor if you observe any of these adverse reactions.

title: Doxolin 60ML Syp
details: This medicine is used as a maintenance treatment for wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness associated with lung diseases like asthma, chronic bronchitis, emphysema etc.
precautions: This medicine should be used with caution in patients having an impairment of normal liver/kidney function. Suitable dose adjustments and safety monitoring is recommended in such cases. This medicine should be used with caution in patients suffering from influenza or have taken flu vaccines. This medicine is not recommended for use by women who are breastfeeding as the risk of adverse effects on the infant is very high. Avoid or limit the uptake of caffeine or caffeine containing product while using this medicine. Some drugs that may interact with this drug are Allopurinol, Phenytoin, Propranolol, Cimetidine, Ciprofloxacin and Salbutamol.
effects: Nausea or Vomiting, Stomach pain, Sleeplessness, Headache, Dizziness, Increased heartbeat

title: Ventolin 2MG Tab 10x10 (L)
details: Ventolin tablets belong to the category of medications known as bronchodilators that are mainly made to treat and prevent bronchial asthma of all types, including chronic bronchitis and emphysema.It is mainly used by people to treat wheezing that pe READ MORE
precautions: It is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to the drug.It is highly advised to always consult your doctor before consuming Ventolin tablet. You should always tell your medical history or if you have any allergies from similar drugs like metaproterenol, terbutaline and levalbuterol.Ventolin tablets contain some inactive ingredients that can cause severe allergic reactions if you do not take proper precautions before using this drug. Do not use this tablet without the prescription of the doctor nor recommend it to anyone for your own.Always tell your doctor beforehand if you have any heart problems such as irregular heartbeats, high blood pressure or diabetes.Women should not take this medication during pregnancy and breastfeeding; otherwise, it may prove harmful.
effects: Shaking and trembling of arms and feet, Irregular heartbeat, Agitation and anxiety, Muscle pain and cramps, Sleep disturbances.There are some side effects too that that is associated with using Ventolin tablet. Headache, dizziness, nervousness and asking may occur. If any of these effects bother you, tell your doctor as soon as possible to avoid health risks.Despite these, Ventolin tablet can cause high blood pressure and fast heartbeat and thus it is recommended to have regular checkups with a doctor to avoid developing heart arrests. You should always tell the doctor if you develop chest pain, irregular heartbeats or sudden wheezing.Although these side effects are temporary, if they persist and remain unnoticed, they can cause fatal breathing problems or asthma. Skin rashes, itching, face/throat swelling, severe drowsiness are also some of the side effects associated with Ventolin tablet.

Follow them to get relief from the disease.Before you start using a Xaltide inhaler, inform the doctorAbout your medical historyIf you are taking any other prescription at the same time.If you have a hypersensitivity problem from the ingredients used in the composition of the Xaltide inhaler.If you are taking any supplements.Avoid increasing the dosage amount than the prescribed one without consulting the doctor.Patients suffering from chest problems should experience some precautions while taking the Xaltide inhaler.Keep the inhaler upright when you are loading than the prescribed dosage.It would be best to replace the inhaler cap each time you use it.Do not exceed the treatment duration than the suggested one.ContraindicationsSome of the contraindications of Xaltide inhalers are given below.The Xaltide inhaler is contraindicated in the medical condition of cardiovascular disease, cardiac disease, and placenta previa, and intrauterine fetal death.It is contraindicated to patients with hypersensitivity problems from the ingredients used in its composition.Use With Caution having Cataracts, Glaucoma, Liver disease, Thyroid problems, Diabetes, Intestinal problems, Osteoporosis, Current Past infections (such as Tuberculosis, Herpes, Fungal), Bleeding problems, Psychosis, Anxiety, Depression.
effects: Xaltide inhaler can cause some side effects. But not every patient taking the Xaltide inhaler needs to experience its side effects. Some of the Xaltide inhaler side effects are listed below. The common side effects caused by the Xaltide inhaler are headache, stomach upset, and irritation in the throat.The severe and rare side effects of using the Xaltide inhaler are white patches on the tongue, infection in the mouth, sore throat, and trouble sleeping. It may also cause nervousness, fever, vision-related problems such as blurred vision, muscle cramps, and an increased level of thirst.It can cause tremors, hyperreactivity problems in children, tightness in the chest, skin rashes, redness of the skin, and irregular heartbeat.If any of the above-described side effects persist or the symptoms get worsen, then consult your doctor and get medical help.Headache, Throat irritation, Stomach upset. title: Combivair 400/6MCG Rotacap 3x10 (L)
details:
Combivair Capsule is a combination of lamivudine and zidovudine drugs, which are antiviral medicines having a high ratio of topical to systemic activity. These drugs belong to the medical class of nucleoside reverse transcript inhibitors (NRTIs).

READ MORE
precautions: Consult your doctor before taking the dosage of Combivair, inform him/her about your recent medical history. Share your medical details if you have any type of allergy or any other disease like liver problem, disturbance in eye pressure, high blood pressure and diabetes, etc.It is possible that the Combivair capsule masks the symptoms of infection, but the infection may be worse than the current situation. So, regularly wash your hands to prevent the spread of infection. As this medicine has the side effect of dizziness and tiredness, be careful while driving or stop driving.Avoid taking any other drug like alcohol; otherwise, you may have the risk of liver disease.Children are more sensitive, and their side effects can harm them, especially pancreatitis. Before any other treatment like surgery of teeth, tell your doctor about your drugs, herbal products, and medicine that you are taking.In case of pregnancy, be aware of your doctor about your condition. he may prescribe you medicine that lowers the chances and amount of HIV in your baby.Do not feed breast milk to your children while taking this medicine as a breast can transmit HIV in your baby.Avoid sharing your personal items with other people to reduce the risk of spreading the virus.Do not share your medicine with other people.
effects: Combivair capsule side effects are listed below.Combivair capsule causes headache, tiredness, and muscle cramps.This medicine also causes loss of appetite, vomiting, and diarrhoea.If someone is taking this medicine, he/she may get trouble sleeping or dizziness, and maybe a stuffy nose occurs.Combivair capsules can also cause dryness in the throat and voice change.Combivair capsules can cause a rash, which is not a serious problem.This is possible that 90% of the people who are taking this medicine may not suffer from all or some of the above serious side effects. If any side effect persist worse effect then immediately consult your doctor promptly.
